text: Lake Nerpichye () is a lake in the Kamchatka Krai of Russia. ==Etymolology== It has its name Nerpichye from the Russian word Нерпа (nerpa), which means so much like (fresh water) poetry. The Turkish word Kultuchnoye means lagoon.Ozero Nerpichye Baikalnature.com über den See. Zuletzt abgerufen am 21. Jui 2016 == References == Category:Lakes of Kamchatka Krai
title: Lake Nerpichye (Kamchatka Krai)
